title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Introducing the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1)!

Get ready for an exciting educational journey with our AR-powered STEM kits that make learning math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving an absolute blast! Perfect for children aged 4-10 years, these STEM toys are designed to develop their counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.

With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, our Plugo app offers progressive education tailored to pre-K to Grade 4 students. The app is inclusive and ensures a fun and engaging learning experience for your child. Plus, there are no additional costs for accessing the app on both the App Store and Play Store.

The Plugo STEM Pack includes three amazing kits - Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. These kits come with a foldable mat featuring a device slot and embedded magnets, providing an immersive and hands-on learning experience. The box also includes a gamepad to enhance the gameplay.

Not only does our Plugo STEM Pack work seamlessly with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire, but it also offers compatibility with a wide range of devices. Whether you're using an iPhone 6 or above, an iPad 5th Gen or above, or one of the supported Amazon Fire models, rest assured that your child can enjoy our STEM toys to the fullest.

Unlock the potential in your child with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link. It's the perfect gift for boys and girls, and it's sure to keep them engaged and excited about learning. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to develop their math, engineering, and linguistic abilities while having a ton of fun!

Order now and watch as your child's STEM skills soar to new heights with Plugo!

The Plugo app offers 15 interactive games and over 750 levels, ensuring progressive education from pre-K to Grade 4. It adapts to your child's learning pace and provides a comprehensive learning experience.

Compatibility is not an issue with the Plugo STEM Pack. It works seamlessly with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire devices. Whether you have an iOS or Android device, you can easily access the Plugo app from the App Store or Play Store.

This STEM Pack is the perfect gift for both boys and girls who love to learn while having fun. It's a great way to foster a love for STEM subjects from an early age.

Don't miss out on this incredible educational toy. Get the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) today and watch your child's learning abilities soar to new heights!

Designed for children aged 4-10 years, this AR-powered STEM toy set includes three amazing components: Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. Each kit is packed with magnetic blocks and puzzles that will challenge and stimulate your child's brain.

With Plugo Count, your little one will develop their counting and arithmetic skills while solving fun puzzles. Plugo Letters will enhance their linguistic abilities and comprehension through word-building activities. And with Plugo Link, they will dive into the world of engineering and problem-solving.

Not only is the Plugo STEM Pack educational, but it's also compatible with a wide range of devices. Whether you have an iPad, iPhone, Samsung tab, or Kindle Fire, this toy will work seamlessly with your device. It's perfect for both boys and girls, making it an ideal gift for any occasion.

The app adapts to your child's skill level, making it suitable for pre-K to Grade 4 students. Best of all, there are no in-app purchases, so you can rest assured that your child will have a safe and enjoyable experience.

Inside the box, you'll find three Plugo kits (Count, Link, and Letters) and one foldable gamepad with a device slot and embedded magnets. Please note that the device is not included.

The Plugo STEM Pack is available on both the App Store and Play Store, so you can easily download the app and start the learning adventure right away.

Don't miss out on this incredible STEM toy that combines education, fun, and imagination. Get your Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) today and watch your child's knowledge and skills soar to new heights.

Worried about compatibility? Rest assured! The Plugo STEM Pack works seamlessly with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire. For iOS devices, it supports iPhone 6 and above, as well as iPad 5th Gen and above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9"). Android devices with a minimum OS version of 8, 2GB RAM, and a front camera at the top center are compatible (except for 10 inches and above tablets). Amazon Fire models 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, and 8+ - 2020 are also supported. You can check the compatibility of your device on the PlayShifu website compatibility dashboard.
